content.detailedDescription: I was 16 at the time and i was hitch-hiking west bound on i 10 heading tocalifornia. sitting on my suitcase for hours by the side of the highway.Finally, around 10 pm, i could see the lights of a car in the distance headingtoward me. the sky was moonless and was extremely clear, the stars shone withincredible beauty. the vehicle pulled up after about ten minutes, it was a whiteford galaxy 500, 4 door. the man mid to late 20,s in age said., where are youheading i answered california. hop in, im going that way. after putting mysuitcase in the back seat i got in and we proceeded westbound on i 10. we drovefor no more than a minute or two when, rounding a curve we both saw and iexitedley yelled wow look at that do you see that off to our left in the sky,visible through his drivers side of the windshield were what i can only describeas sparklers you know the kind one would light on christmas or new years as achild and would blazen and throw off sparks all around while being waved aroundor in circles. well i was so exited, but never the less i noticed a crossing inthe median that continued into a dirt road on the other side of the highway andturned into a dirt road which led into the direction of the lights. these lightswere sow bright that they lit up the whole side of a mountain range includingthe dirt road. so i immediately yelled to the driver, stop, stop, go back, takethe di
content.summary: Saw silvery sparkes, taken underground by military

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on kennedy ave,movement in the sky,a balloon,i realised it was nota balloon when i saw it was flying aganist the wind,i tried to pull over butcould not due to traffic. it was silverwhite and flew from the nw to se,it flewin a straight line from nw to se.Lost sight as it flew south and i moved north.Iam an amateur astronomer and have seen many strange things at night, but nothinglike this durning the day. i am also a world war two reseacher and am constantlylooking up durning the day, looking for aircraft and at night watchingsatellites,stars, planets and meteorites. i have been doing this for 28 yearsand have identifed unknown objects many times before. such as military aircraftat night, fireballs, satellites,balloons.
content.summary: I saw a silver white disk

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is nigel,the event that im about to describe took place day beforeyesterday, jul2604. i had left my house at 715am to go across the street to thebus stop,i was about to be on my way to school.I was standing near the bus stopwaiting for the bus.5 minutes after i arrived at the bus stop at about 720am,iheard what i thought was an airplane taking off from jfk intl i live nearjfk,but the sound only lasted 3 seconds,so i thought that was strange,but didntthink much about it,then about 4 seconds after i heard the sound stop,i say 4objects flying in the sky,they were a little of in the distance,not too far atall,they were closer to where i was than the airplanes are when they takeoff,and they were somewhat low to the ground. what made me notice the objectswas their shine,when the first appeared the sun was just glistening off ofthem,so they look like silver balloons,they were flying together pretty slow,andat the same exact speed,and thats what i thought they were at first,balloons.Soi searched to see if i could see a balloon string that held them together soclose,but within 1 secong of that search,i already saw that there was no stringat all,my heart started to race a bit,all of this happened within 4 seconds ofthem appearing to my vision.Then right after that 4 second time periodfinished,the crafts started to fly in a twisty, and varied orbit aroundeachother,they cut eachother off as they orbited,thats when my heart began toreally pump,they did all of this flying foward at their slow pace,on a steadyhorizontal path.They continued to orbit around eachother for about 4seconds,then they all flew into a formation, the formation was a slantedvertical formation,they were still flying foward slowly,1 under the other.Theyflew like that for 2 seconds,then they went right back to the cut off,twistyorbit around eachother,and by that time they were closer than they were whenthey had appeared,but still flying away,and still flying along the samehorizontal path.This was when i could better see their backs,and i made out whati had thought to be lights earlier on,were lights,each of the 4 had 1 light ontheir backs that blinked to green,and red,and white,in a random order.They wereall exremely identical,they were very dark brown in color,but very shiny likeglass,their backs were flat,and very very chrome-
content.summary: 4 very strangely shaped objects that flew together

content.detailedDescription: I was stepping off the porch of my studio when i heard a low jet-like sound andlooked up to locate the object. when i first saw the object, i thought it was amilitary jet fighter aircraft. i didnt notice any wings or tail section on thecraft so i grabbed by sony mavica fd88 digital camera and immediately snapped apicture of the object. as soon as the camera reset, i zoomed to full capacityand snapped another picture.  my camera uses 3.5 floppy disks, which i amsubmitting the original to you with this form. the object was traveling from swand heading ne leaving two vapor trails behind it. it appeared a red-orangecolor which may have been caused by the sun light reflections as the sun was lowon the horizon. the moon was overhead with a clear calm sky as it passed over. i watched it go out of sight in a ne direction. the object was traveling veryfast and the sighting lasted only two to three minutes total. i live about fourmiles north of grapeland, texas off of us 287_east about one mile.
content.summary: Shiny disk shaped object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this event for my husband. on tuesday july 27th 130 am my husbandjustin was traveling south on interstate 25 in new mexico. he is a truck driver.The night sky was pitch dark. no moon or cloud cover. traveling at 63 mph henoticed a bright blue light about 12 mile ahead on the exit ramp south boundside exit 138 it appeared to be like a blue laser similar to the light peopleput on the hoods of their cars. as he came nearer the ramp he saw two figuresaproximately 3-4ft tall. each was either holding a blue light or the light wascoming from their head area. he couldnt tell for sure. as he continued thefigures appeared to be looking north and south. they looked toward his truck ashe went by.  the figures seemed to have on loose fitting bright silver suits,similar to haz mat suits. he couldnt tell if they were wearing helmets.  theterrain was flat and he did not see any vehicles in the area. the ramp was anoverpass so nothing could of been out of his view. he slowed to turn around andgo back but the next exit was 30 miles down the road. my husband and i have beendriving truck for 14 years, we have seen strange lights but nothing as strangeas this. please feel free to call if you would like a first hand account. thankyou robyn webster
content.summary: Strange sighting in new mexico

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in ejazs class when an ufo came though the roof from the sky,came though the roof not much apparent damage, and then procedded to use beamsto and there shiny lights to make a disco like situation that made some want todance, little time passed when we we began to have sexual feelings as welevitated they came from there ship and danced with john in a saturday nightfever like dance. they then took the servers and use a forget-me beem to makemost of us forget whilst they use a forget-me-not beem on some of us so we wouldremeber, they then left us with levetating sexual rubics cubes that made us feelwarm they also made a crackeling, buzzing, swishing, roar of a noise then tehyleft....
content.summary: I was sitting in ejazs class room, and they stole

content.detailedDescription: Please contact  www.Aliendata.4t.Com  for info we know were the live
content.summary: Www.Aliendata.4t.Com  www.Breastcancerunderground.

content.detailedDescription: I am submitting this report from the third night of our sightings.  iviewed them the 1st night alone discovered when i went out on the backdeck for a smoke at 2355 cst.  my eyes were immediately drawn to the northsky, as a vessel larger than an airplane flew n to s - entire horizon inabout 10 seconds.  i then saw a star-like object in the ne sky that wasflying in broken patterns, small circles, similar to a small bug.  it flickeredout after 6 minutes of movement.The next night i viewed the exact same thing with a flight attendant aswitness, at 2255.  she confirmed the object flying n to s was not an airplane,or a satellite.The next 2 nights were cloudy.Night 3 of viewing july 2304 was done from a field outside saskatoon,where we discovered these same objects flying all over the sky.  we sawa total of 12 in the skies over a 2 hour period.  we viewed these objectsthrough binoculars, we could clearly see they are an artificial light, avery intense halogenflourescent white, and much lower than the stars,even though they could pass as stars if they didnt move around so much.I viewed them with witness 3 on july 2404, from 2230 - 0030.  there arrearsto be 2 of the same, larger objects that travel to a position approx. at a 70and 80 degree angle.  they remain constant, hovering only slightly.  some of thesmaller objects fly in the vicinity of the larger objects, and very occasionallyflash a pink or white light as they go by.  with binoculars, the 2 largerobjects appear to be emanating light from one side, appearing smooth on thatside.  the other side of the objects appears jagged and almost transluscent.The smaller objects appear cylindrical and somewhat transparent.We have seen them the last 2 nights as well.  i viewed them tonite... there issome low cloud cover, and they are the only lights visible in the sky,making their altitude much lower than stars. visible to the naked eye throughthe clouds.  there are usually 6 in the sky at any given time, from dusk todawn.Has anyone else seen thesecan anyone provide an explanation
content.summary: Same moving lights in sky every night since july 1

content.detailedDescription: the witness was referred to minnesota mufon by cufos.  the witness is anindependent truck driver.  he commented that he was taking a month and a halfoff, because otherwise he would lose money.When i first called the witness on 2-9-03, he said he had seen a light in thesky, and he felt energetics from it.  the witness said he had read davidmorehouse, and that he was interested in communicating with ets.  he also felthe had received a message that two other people had seen the object and that heshould report it, so he did.  he may have received the impression that therewere two witnesses in the two airplanes that he thought passed near the object. there is no way for me to judge how close the two planes passed to the object,and we received no other reports for that date.  in his attempts to report thisobject, he called the university of minnesota.  he also called the [minneapolis]planetarium but got no answer.  he didnt want to fill out a form, but after isaid i would fill out the form with his answers, he agreed to review and signit.No on-site investigation was carried out.  the witness lives in clinton, ohio. at the time of the sighting, the witness was driving a truck on interstate 94heading west.  initially he said he was near st. paul, minnesota.  he said hewas between mile 47 and 52.  under later questioning he seemed to be saying thathe was 50 miles east of the intersection of 494/694, which would place him inwisconsin.  the witness was very difficult to question, going off on tangents. but he signed the form 1, which said he was in washington county near st. paul. he said he was tired when he saw the object.  it was near the end of his shift,which had started when he left ohio.  he had been driving for 11 hours, andnoted his sighting in his truck log.  at the time he saw the object, he wasntthinking of ets, he said.  he then commented that ets have enough power to doanything that they want to, to you.  but, he said, the greys are trying tohelp us heal ourselves.  he said he was aware of satellites that monitorthoughts for the government.He is a student of the martial arts and can feel chi (chinese term for a formof mental energy, i believe) and he seemed to be saying that he felt a similarenergy from the ufo.  he said that they use human energy to make their craftappear.  he said the energy from the ufo is still ingrained in his head, thatthe ets can project energy.  then he seemed to perhaps slip into a state like atrance and he said, the craft is going black; can see the craft is white now there is antimatter around the craft  no longer in the truck  i did notfollow up this strange interlude, which could suggest that he was abducted,because he then described (presumably) the motions of the ufo:  it went higher,to the right [so it was] straight ahead at a 30o or 40 o elevation .  when lastseen it was at a 60 o or 70 o elevation.  the ufo went between two airplanes butthere was no blockage of view.  the shape was that of two balls or spheres, onesmaller than the other, put together (partially coalesced), smaller than amarble at arms length, perhaps aspirin size, perhaps the size of amuzzle-loader ball.  color was clear white with a tinge of blue.  he said thatthe reptilians have cloaked vessels (i.E., invisible).
content.summary: Truck driver sees object like 2 spheres at 2 am on

content.detailedDescription: there were a number of reports of a meteor-like object at about 6:15 am on themorning of january 25, 1990. two sightings allegedly took place about 15 minutesapart , by two men who were brothers.  reports were submitted on both of these:brooklyn park sighting: witness #1 reported that at 6:10am he was travelingsouth on hwy# 169, saw a bright light green object coming out of the southwestagainst the dark morning sky. the object seemed to be tilted and descending at asteep approximate 65 degree angle, just over the tree tops in the area near thehwy. witness presumed that at the low altitude that it was traveling and itstrajectory that it was on a certain crash course. he craned his neck to continuewatching the object until he lost sight of it as it went down behind some treesin the area. the event lasted approximately 5 seconds.Moundsview sighting: witness #2 reported that at 6:25am he was travelingsouthbound on pleasant valley drive, by car, approaching county road h on hisway to work. the object when first noticed appeared to hover and then suddenlyat great speed shot off traveling in easterly trajectory, disappearing from viewbehind some trees in the area. the event lasted approximately 20 seconds.It is probable that one or both witnesses were mistaken about the times and thedirections, and that the sightings actually took place almost simultaneously.
content.summary: Many witnesses reported meteor-like object.

content.detailedDescription: Whale watching boat left boston harbor 1400 for 1.5 hour trip east to atlanticto view whales.  my husband and i were standing on bow of ship looking in alldirections when i sited object hovering in the sky at quite a distance away fromboat. appears over land, but may not be.  as i watched, it did not move, verywindy day, large billowy clouds in the sky, object never strayed.  tower visiblein photos, object much higher than tower, not connected to anything on land. continued to observe scenery all around, every time we looked back, object wasthere - occassionaly observed it fade in and out, but cloud cover much higherthan object.  trapezoid or rectangular shaped.  eventually lost site of land andobject.  upon returning 4 hours later, object gone.  feeling during siting,object not natural or anything my husband and i have ever observed as man-made. used zoom on camera to get a better view of object as it was very far from ourlocation.  took 3 digital photos - 1st on regular focus, 2nd and 3rd with fullzoom.  will send photos to mufon for analysis.
content.summary: Stationary object viewed from boat in boston harbo

content.detailedDescription: Hi, we took a few pictures of a waterspout by the adriatic coast, in portonovo,ancona, italy. looking at the 6 photographs we took in consecutive order, wenoticed on the last two, a dark mark that really shouldnt have been there. wewould be glad if somebody could give us any opinion to our findings.We have photographs we would like to send you showing the dot appeared secondsafter the first four photographs that were taken. this is the first time we havecome across such a strange object in our photographs.Best regardsalessia paoletti and jeff pulley
content.summary: Waterspout ufo photograph

content.detailedDescription: We can not explain this very well.
content.summary: Close encounter of the 2nd kind

content.detailedDescription: I was going to pick up my daughter. as i look into the sky i saw dancing lightsin the the night sky. i ran back in the house and got my wife. the object sloweddown and hovered about 30 sec. all the while the lights changed from white tored and to a color i have not seen before. then it moved slowly to sthe s.W. ofthe sky then as fast i saw it it had vanished.
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: the witness was getting a ride home from work. they were driving west onarrowhead road about 5:30 pm.  she looked up and saw what she thought was aplane heading towards the airport, but it was moving too slow to be a plane. when she looked closer, she saw a large triangle.  it was moving very slowly andit had a cluster of lights underneath in the center.  the lights were steady anda yellowish color.  they were unable to pull over due to heavy traffic
content.summary: Witness sees large triangle while riding home in d
Firey bright object streaked from the north left t

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on us-283 near willow, ok early on the morning of july 21stand saw a strange object hovering to the west. i slowed down and managed to takea picture, but since the car was still moving it turned out a little blurred. bythe time i came to a full stop it had vanished.Ive seen strange objects while driving through this area before, which is why idecided to start bringing a camera with me.Photo submitted to jim hickamn
content.summary: Glowing saucer sighted near willow, oklahoma

content.detailedDescription: I was in the first grade and as such i dont remember much. i was in the backyard playing after school, i looked up and saw a strange star moving around thesky. if i remember at all i guess i thought it seeemed to be pretty with nosense of fear. soon i noticed the yard where i was playing seemed somehow growbrighter and remember my mom calling me in. it was past my bedtime i had onlyseemed to be outside for a few minutes. afterwards my concentration at schoolslowly increased and i started to get as in both my math and science areas.Before then i was lucky to get a c or a d in those areas. i dont believe therewas an abduction experience, but there was lost time and an unexpected increasein my ability to concentrate.I am now involved in several warp drive development groups on yahoo.
content.summary: Coming out of closet ufo sighting in first grade

content.detailedDescription: Around 1230pm friday afternoon, while sitting in my parked car i caught aglipmse of this white, cigar or cylinder shaped object against the bright bluenorthwest sky. it was definately too small to be an airplane at the low altitudeit looked to be at, and what really caught my attention was how fast it wastraveling and the fact that it changed position in the sky as it traveledthrough a low-hanging cloud, then dissapeared behind some trees total viewingtime was 2-4 seconds. i drove up the block to see if it was maybe a plane, and ithen i could explain what i saw but i was not able to view anything in the sky.Another wierd aspect is the direction in which it was traveling, it traveledfrom east to west in a slight downward motion, i live about 20-25 milesnorthwest of the airport and we have planes travel over this area all the time,but i have never ever seen anything that looked like, or traveled like that inanyway. the next day, saturday, i was telling my dad, who lives in the samearea, what i had seen and he was totally shocked because he said that heactually seen something earlier that morning saturday that was almost exactlywhat i had described... whatever we saw was wierd.
content.summary: White cigar shaped object travels high speed thru

content.detailedDescription: 1. soaking in our hot tub, located on a flat plank deck in the backyard.2. i had been looking up at the sky, looking at the constellations and watchingsatellites, aircraft, and meteors traverse the sky.3. a ufothat is, an unidentified flying object.4. i was surprised.  it crossed the sky faster than anything ive ever seen - 2or 3 seconds, at most.5. what i saw of it consisted of three dim rather than blinding or bright whitelights that were cool in character, like florescent lights rather thanincandescent, arranged in a perfect equilateral triangle.  the lights had kindof a poached-egg appearance, in that the center of each circular light wasslightly different in brilliance than the rest of the cirle.  i saw it as itpassed from the northwest, directly overhead, and moved toward the southwest.  icould not make out a surface or structure between the lights, but they did notmove in position with respect to one another, so they gave the appearance ofbeing parts of a single structure.  the object required only 2 or 3 seconds atmost to traverse an arc of about 45 degrees of open, cloudless sky before treesobstructed my view.  if it were a fighter jet traveling at close to supersonicspeed very close to the ground, im not sure that it could have covered that muchsky as quickly, and certainly could not have done so without any sound.6. trees that grow on the other side of our backyard fence and the canal bankbeyond them obscured further observation.
content.summary: Triangular craft over boise, idaho

content.detailedDescription: Phoenix, arizona..Car battery was dead, needed smokes, started to walk fromhome,old,tiny,enclave, horseshoe type, neighborhood in desert, use to be wheretuberculosis people came to get healthy back in 30s,very quiet littlecommunity,also surrounded by mountains...Walked south then west then south, theneast around neighborhood block, about 5min altogether. i walk fast..About 75ftlater i saw the hawk laying on the wind and smiled, love metaphysics, took it tomean a good omen...Been having a rough time for too long....Car trouble wasntneeded.. sky perfect.Aprox 1015am...Clear as a window,only thing in sky is thehawk, azure blue, not one cloud, very sunny,aprox 90 degrees,had sunglasses on,head down still walking, look to my left again aprox. 200ft away, hawk stillfloating on the air, back and forth gliding,about 100ft up, but now i noticenortheast of hawk,i thought at time aprox. 100 feet away from hawk,and a bithigher,what i take to be a white pidgeon, doing the same thing, many pidgeonsaround here, think private breeder in neighborhood as well, see them releasedand fly as a group occasionally and go back to same place always... been here 312 years. head down and still walking, look again, that bird is awful white. hdwn, stil wlkg,lk again, didnt realize pidgeons layed on the air like a hawk, hdwn, stil wlking, why would a pidgeon want to play on the wind near a hawk ilook up again, stil wking, and the pidgeon is not floating back and forthanymore, its hovering, same place, but wings arnt moving at all, must be astrong updraft, but now where is the hawk i look at the pidgeon again and ithink man, that must really be a clean bird cause the lite is reflecting off thetop of it like crazy, use to have a cockatoo and 2 amazons for 15 years, shineyfeathers but not that shiney and i slow down and stop, turn and payattention.......Its still just hovering, no wing movement, how far is it am isure its  not a plane yes, sure......Planes dont float back and forth, is itpidgeon,  no updraft or wind to keep pidgeon up, no wind at all...How can it dothat   it cant,  what the hell is this  then i look for the hawk, nowhere, thatwas too fast,all this conversation in my hea
content.summary: Hawks and pidgeons dont hover together, yet now i

content.detailedDescription: Around 900 p.M. i was in my mothers backyard to turn the sprinkler off, and wasgazing up at the stars as it was a beautiful, clear, moonless night. as i lookedtoward the north i saw a string of lights-about the brightness of a mediumstar-heading toward me, moving south. at first i thought it might be a string ofballoons reflecting street lights broken loose from somewhere, but almostimmediately i realized that these were not rising, but moving in a straight linetoward me.When i first spotted the lights, they were about 200 yards north andabout 200 feet high. it was not directly overhead but over the street in frontof my mothers house, app.60 ft. in front of where i was standing. it was movingabout the same speed as a car would , app. 15-20 mph. it was a string of about10 lights, evenly spaced app. 10-15 ft. apart. just as it was almost to me, 3 or4 lights in the center of the string went out. as it passed , i noticed thatthere was absolutely no sound, as it is very quiet where my mother lives.Immediately after it passed where i was standing, the lights came back on again.It proceeded south and i watched it for about another 20-25 seconds, about aquarter mile, and was just going to run to my car to follow it, when instantlyall lights vanished as if someone had hit the off switch. i stared in thedirection it had been heading, but saw nothing more. it was such a dark night, inever did see any shape, but thought that a cylinder or cigar shape wouldprobably be the most likely.                    as soon as i realized i was mostlikely looking at a ufo, i felt almost shocked. in fact i remember my jawdropping about the time it was directly over me. immediately after i ran insideand called several of my friends and family to tell them what i saw. at thistime i was a long haul truck driver i now own a business here on maui and hadbeen experiencing an interesting nighttime phenomena for 11 years. since 1987when i was a taxi driver, i noticed that many streetlights went out immediatelyas i was passing them, never in front or behind me. some nights this happened7-8 times. it never mattered what vehicle i was driving, or how many cars infront or back of me there were. i often wonder if that had any connection to thelights going out when it passed by me. being a truck driver, i saw many strangethings, but nothing has ever come close to what i saw that night that i cantexplain.Every night when i look at the stars, i still look for a string of lights,although i dont know whether i want to see
content.summary: Ufo sighting in portland, or

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my apartment looking out of the west window and recieved atelapathic message to go outside, cross the street, face west and you will seeus  i did  and i saw the biggest ship i could have imagined.  it took up theentire west sky, decreased in altitude and vanished behind the tree line with abright flash of white light.
content.summary: Large ship west palm beach florida

content.detailedDescription: Witness statement from tape recordingi went to walk my dogs. it was about 1215 when i left. i took the dogs, i walkedup a block, i heard an airplane. i looked up because its dark, i like to look atthe lights, theyre pretty. i watched the airplane for a few seconds and then asi could see the tail end of the airplane i at first thought that i saw somethingshoot out of it. it was golden-amber in color. it was moving in the direction ofthe plane, so i knew that it wasnt something that was shot out of the plane.Then i said oh, thats really cooli just saw a shooting star, even though it wasnt the color or the height atwhich you would usually see a shooting star. and it disappeared. the dogs arestill kind of sniffing aroundi looked up at the sky and saw the same colored light, same size, coming fromthe opposite direction and flying in the opposite direction of the first one isaw. it also lasted about 20 seconds or so. about a minute later i saw it againcoming from a third different spot and heading back to the original spot wherethey all kind of convened.Then i came back into the house and i thought i had been outside for 10, maybe15 minutes, but it was 1255 in the morning, so i went to bed. even though thelights were really pretty and i was happy when i saw them, when i went to bed igot terrified and couldnt sleep and had to turn all the lights on inside myhouse so i could try and rest.
content.summary: Miami amber lights

content.detailedDescription: I work at a country club located in northern california near a town calledwoodside. i work security there and i went to empty out my office waste basketand on my way back i was looking in the sky at a hawk that was shieking andriding the air currents. i notice there was a stationary object high up in thesky and it immediately caught my attention. it was very high up and not reallyvisible unless you knew where to look. it was cylindrical  and cone like on oneend. the cylindrical part was somewhat fuzzy with not as much detail as the coneend. it was completely stationary in the sky. i watched it for about 25 secondsbut i had to take my eyes off of it as people were driving through the frontgate and i needed to divert my attention. this happened about 3 times and on thefourth time i could no longer locate the object. the object was a mettaliclooking and appeared to be somewhat relective. the body looked fuzzy and sort ofwashed out yet the cone part was larger and had much more visible detail. myestimation was that it was very high up  thousands of feet and very large.Bigger than an airliner
content.summary: Ufo over redwood city ca

content.detailedDescription: After watching from a distance of nw calgary - tuscany the calgary stampedefireworks display in downtown at7e1145pm we decided to stay outside and to bring out my telescope into thebackyard - which faces due south. after looking up for 15mins for new targets totrain the telscope on, i noticed an object coming out of the west movingextremely rapidly. it had a shape that at arms length would fit on your pinkynail. it was not a point of light, it seemed to only reflect ambient light fromthe street lights surrounding the neighborhood - and was slightly brighter thanthe background stars. no lights on it. no sound. no trails . when it was almostoverhead 2s after i first saw it , ben picked it up and we both watched it flyout due east within7e2s more. so, from horizon to horizon, aprox. 4s travel time its height isdifficult to describe, as night was clear. interestingly, it would have traveledover or very near calgary international airport and their radar records could bechecked.We do not feel this was a meteor, low flying bird, jet, etc. i am an amateurastronomer, and know what it wasnt. hope this helps.
content.summary: Fast object over calgary, alberta

content.detailedDescription: It was early in the eve and just happen to look out and there was a light that inevere saw before.It wasnt a star either. i watched it for 5 mins and bang gone. i could see it ifa falling stare or something no way. it went up in the sky in no secs at all. isaw unsolvemysters the other nite about these guys in maine usa and it was justlike that. i never flashed anything. some glad i never. i hate pain.You know you asked about head aces. i been having head ace more i ever did. ibeen plaming it on the weather. i dont drink ar smoke cigs or garss.I beleave there are something out there but i dont thinkthey are what others saywhat they look like cant say forsure and dont want too. i wasnt going to brotherbut after the oter nit i feel i should.
content.summary: Large bright light

content.detailedDescription: Shapespheresurfaceglowingit was in 1975 so its a bit hard to give directoin and a fiew facts frome beingbut i rember it like yesterday and i still see it it will never go away in mymind it was real and i sware to my testomenystructuredomeapparent_sizelargeractual_sizeover_300_feetsurface_colororange
content.summary: Summer night after highschool

content.summary: Seattle sighting

content.detailedDescription: My wife and kids and i were renting out a mountain house in lenoir, nc, onenight i went onto the deck and witnessed a bright orange ball in the n.E. sky,it was hovering from righ to left, nothing like i have ever seen. i have alwaysfelt a presence about me, as if someone is looking over my shoulder after thisevent. i am a family man, 3 kids, a mortgage loan officer... i dont honestlyknow what to do about this, i only know i have to tell someoen to relieve thepressure on myself. to see something like this, and to feel what i feel, isalmost more than one person can handle. i need to know there is support outthere, but i cannot jeopordize my family and my career. thank you.
content.summary: Sighting in the mountains of lenoir nc
